structural_units.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: Preparation of concert programmes and performances, preparation of repertoire for song festivals and participation in song festivals, basics of elementary music theory, vocal training, voice as a musical instrument, basics of vocal technique, aesthetics of music, opportunity to participate in the summer school of singers of the Estonian Mixed Choirs Association (singing classical masterpieces with an orchestra under the direction of expert conductors), public performances, participation in the events of the UT, Faculty of Medical Sciences.
description.et: Kontsertkavade ja esinemiste ettevalmistamine, laulupidude repertuaari ettevalmistamine ja laulupidudel osalemine, muusika elementaarteooria põhialused, hääleseade, häälekasutus, vokaaltehnika põhialused, muusika esteetika, võimalus osaleda Eesti Segakooride Liidu lauljate suvekoolis ja laulda suurvorme koos orkestriga väga heade dirigentide juhatusel, avalikud esinemised, osalemine TÜ meditsiiniteaduste valdkonna sündmustel.

objectives.en: To enable students to participate in the practical work of a mixed choir, including learning to use their vocal apparatus as a musical instrument and to receive practice in public performing.
objectives.et: Võimaldada üliõpilastel osaleda segakoori praktilises töös, sh õppida kasutama oma hääleaparaati kui muusikainstrumenti ning saada avaliku esinemise praktikat.

learning_outcomes.en: * has the necessary knowledge, practical skills and experience to sing in a mixed choir;
learning_outcomes.et: *         omab segakooris laulmiseks vajalikke teadmisi, praktilisi oskusi ja kogemust;

learning_outcomes.en: * has acquired basic knowledge of the basic theory of music;
* knows composers, text authors, musical styles and aesthetics of music in the choir's repertoire;
learning_outcomes.et: *         omab teadmisi koori repertuaaris olevate teoste heliloojatest, tekstiautoritest, muusikastiilidest ja muusika esitamise esteetikast;

learning_outcomes.en: * has acquired basic knowledge of the basics of vocal technique, the sound unity of the vocal group and the sound image of a mixed choir;
learning_outcomes.et: *         on omandanud baasteadmised vokaaltehnika põhialustest, häälerühma kõlalisest ühtsusest ja segakoori kõlapildist;

learning_outcomes.en: * has acquired the repertoire of the respective semester of the mixed choir.
learning_outcomes.et: *         on omandanud segakoori vastava semestri repertuaari.
